PlotterÂ¶

The plotter will automatically visualize the potential, wavefuctions, expected values of the Local operator and the energies. The user needs to execute the schrodinger_plotter.py to do so. The following files will be used automatically:

  • potential.dat
  • wavefuncs.dat
  • expvalues.dat
  • energies.dat

These will be created, if an schrodinger.inp is created according to the example (see README oder schrodinger_solver) if the schrondinger_solver.py is executed beforehand. The result should look similar to the following graphs:
